oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Correspondence] : manuscript, 1900-1901
Copie de lettres
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ali Fahrî.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copies of letters written by a young Turk in exile in Geneva between 1900 and 1901.
Written in riqʻa, varying number of lines per page.
Onionskin paper. Water stains, ink penetration. Black binding, cloth spine.
End papers replete with references, apparently by a later hand, to individual letters and page numbers.

Printed original pagination in notebook. Pp. 1-181 written upside down in relation to the original pagination; pp. 182-248 also upside down but written form other end of the notebook. Pp. 38-9, 138, 174, 177, 184 missing.
MS Turk 48. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ali Fahrı̂
İttihat ve Terakki Cemiyeti.
Correspondence
Turkey--Politics and government--1878-1909
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Karateke, Ottoman Turkish manuscripts and documents at Harvard's Houghton Library,
